docs.title: Welcome to Tanki Wiki!
docs.text:
This site is dedicated to everything Tanki (Мир танков) for English speaking users. Here you’ll find guides, details on events, game modes, modding resources payment tutorials and so on.

Use the sidebar to navigate through different sections.

If you’d like to contribute or have suggestions, feel free to join our discord.

Enjoy exploring the wiki & Happy tanking!

docs.title: About
docs.text:
Tanki Wiki is an open resource for all things Tanki (Мир танков).

The goal of this wiki is to provide detailed, up-to-date information on the game, including mechanics, tanks, guides, and modding.

This project is community-driven and always open to contributions, feedback, or corrections.

If you want to help, suggest edits, or have any questions, feel free to get in touch.

Last updated: June 2025

docs.title: Balance changes comparing current WG to Lesta params
docs.text:
Warning

This page is still WIP, it can be lacking some tanks. Nations missing: China, Japan, Poland, Sweden, Italy

Additional information

All tanks in here are sorted by the nation. Click on the nation you are looking for to show the rebalances in that nation. The page is currenlty containing only tier X tech tree and Steel Hunter vehicles. We are comparing WG to Lesta stats on this page.

Good to know

f/s/b stands for Front/Side/Back h/m/s stands for Hard/Medium/Soft

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Stay updated: For the latest info, updates, and community help, join our Discord server.

docs.title: How to Get the Game
docs.text:
1. Go to the official website: Download the game client from Mir Tankov Website.

  1. Install the game: Run the installer and follow the setup steps.

  2. Create an account: Sign up using your email, or log in if you already have an account; If you don't go to Mir Tankov Registeration Website.

  3. Launch and play: Open the game, log in, and you’re ready to go.

docs.title: How to install the Translation
docs.text:
1. Getting the Installer: Go to our GitHub site and download the latest version of the installer.

  2. Installing the mod: Run it, Accept the agreement and select the language you need (English by default); And if you want your Game Center to get extra languages aswell.

docs.title: Need Help?
docs.text: If you run into any issues installing or running the game, check our FAQ or hop onto the Discord—someone from the community is usually around to help.

docs.title: Next Steps
docs.text:
• Purchases
  • Rebalances (WIP)
  • Mods

docs.title: Mods
docs.text:
Warning

In here you will find popular and requested mods that work with Мир танков starting from 1.35.0.0 version

Tip

Mod format can be changed from .wotmod to .mtmod manually via win explorer, however they might or might not work.

docs.title: LeBwa Gunmarks Calculator
docs.text: As the name says, the mod calculates your Gunmark precentage You can download the mod here

docs.title: Reticle size Remover
docs.text: Now you will be seeing your in-game Reticle in the actual size, without any restrictions to the max size You can download the mod here

docs.title: Extanded Blacklist
docs.text: This mode is supposed to extand your blacklist (if you would ever need more of it) You can download the mod here

docs.title: Purchases
docs.text: There are 3 ways on how to do it: First is through a friend Second is selecting Belarus Third is selecting Russian Federation

docs.title: The Friend method
docs.text: This method requires you to have a friend that lives in Russia or Belarus, how it works? You basically send them money in any sort of a way, CounterStrike 2 skins, crypto etc. In return they give you the item you want through a gift that you will recieve on the Mir Tankov Gifts site.

docs.title: Belarus method
docs.text:
This method requires you to have your account PoR (Place of Residence) set to Belarus and owning a MasterCard.

If you do, reveal the steps!
  1. You choose the item you want to purchase in the Premium Store.
  2. Choose the "ЕРИП" payment method.
  3. Click "Перейти к оплате".
  4. Copy the numbers that popped up on your screen.
  5. Go to the ParitetBank site
  6. Select "Интернет-магазины/сервисы" -> "Игры, социальные сети" -> "А-Я Кириллические домены" -> "М" -> "Мир Танков" -> "Оплата покупки с lestagames.by"
  7. Paste in your code and click "Далее".
  8. Confirm by clicking "Подтвердить".
  9. Enter your information and pay.

docs.title: Russian Federation method
docs.text:
This method requires you to have your account PoR (Place of Residence) set to Russian Federation. You go to FunPay and from there you have a lot of offers to choose from.

Warning

Make sure the seller has a bigger amount of reviews (like BarsShop) and that the items are not under the price of what is in game.
